Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Bystander
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the money. It has a good picture and I was astonished at it's low light capability. The only complaint I have after about 1 month's use is that the information and directions included with the camera are VERY lacking. The only thing included tells how to adjust the varifocal lense and even then it is a poor desription and apparently poorly translated from another language (grammar). Even though there are 6 switches & 1 rotating level adjustment on the back of the camera there are no directions for any of that whatsoever. Perhaps they think a pro installer don't need them but for a camera of this price there would probably be many amateur installers buying them. There is also a tiny allen wrench included with the camera and I found "a place" on the camera to use it but I have no idea what it does! Lack of information is why I only gave this camera 4 stars instead of 5 but otherwise I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Teaching Microscope Camera
Reviews.Author: microscopyman
Reviews.Content: Excellent value and service.  Camera is being used without lens on microscope and wish there was a option to buy camera without lens in order to lower already good price.

Reviews.Title: Works fine but short of my expectations
Reviews.Author: Kizito K.
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of these cameras. They work fine only that their resolution did not meet my expectations. They also have poor night vision but work fine during the day time.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Effio CCD Color DSP Security Camera. NTSC signal system
700TV Lines horizontal resolution. 0.01 Lux Mini Illumination. Auto IRIS Electronic Shutter
C/CS Lens Mount. DNR (Digital Noise Reduction) function
Can be mounted on the wall or ceiling
Package included: 1 of high resolution camera, 1 of 2-6'' adjustable bracket, 1 x 6-60 vari-focal lens, 1 of 12V DC power supply and 1 of security camera sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu CCTV Surveillance Camera Built-in 1/3'' Sony Effio CCD 700TVL Zoom Security Camera with Power Supply, 6-60mm Varifocal Lens and Camera Bracket SC70 CSR
